    • Method Detail

      • validMotion

        public boolean validMotion(char newFile,
                           int newRank,
                           Board board)
        Asserts that the new space (newFile, newRank) is either diagonally, horizontally, or vertically away from the Queen's current position. If it is, this method checks to make sure no pieces are in the Queen's way in that direction.
        Parameters:
        newFile - file coordinate of new position
        newRank - rank coordinate of new position
        board - Current state of the chess board
        Returns:
        true if the motion fits the Queen's behavior

        Returns:
        the character for a Queen: 'Q'
